title: The least frequent daily users of social media

In the four year period of investigation 35-44 aged between 11 and 18 15-24 old had the highest least frequent Minutes of with 150 Minutes of frequent Minutes in their diet .

gold: This chart shows the average daily use of social media among different age groups . The 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 age groups are tied as the least frequent users with under 80 minutes , followed by 55 - 64 with 110 minutes , 15 - 24 with a little over 120 minutes , and finally 45 - 54 with 150 minutes .
